name: Gopalakrishna Hegde
body:
# __Study__

__Bachelor of Engineering__(ECE) from PES Institute of Technology, Bangalore, India.

__Master of Science__ (Embedded Systems) from Nanyang Technological University, Singapore.
***
# __Projects__

* __Handwritten Digit Recognition__

Hand written digit recognition is the simplest example for a machine learning application. This project uses supervised learning method using [MNIST](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/MNIST_database) database. A three layer neural network with 25 hidden neurons is used to make the classification. This implementation achieves ~95% training and ~92% testing accuracy over MNIST dataset.
Source code can be found [here](https://github.com/gplhegde/detect-my-digits)
* __Visual Saliency Detection__

Source code can be found [here](https://github.com/gplhegde/Visual_saliency_detection)
* __Deep Learning Stack Implementation on Soft Vector Processor__

Get the source code [here](https://github.com/gplhegde/Deep_learning_SoC)
* __Time-predictable DDR3 DRAM Controller__
.
